msbt.message: I was so pumped about the present Santa got me that last night, I had a dream about him, .I dreamed we compared abs, and guess what? He. Was. SHREDDED!
Getting a gift from Santa has me mega hyped! I feel so festive, I could sprint for days, !
Thanks for the awesome Toy Day present! You're like Santa, but with way bigger biceps, !
Hey, your gift absolutely made my Toy Day. You're the best rival anyone could ever ask for, !
I got presents from both you AND Santa yesterday. It was like the best one-two punch ever, !

Toy Day RULED! How'd I luck out and get gifts from both you and Santa?Hmm I'll bet it was all the sit-ups I did. Sit-ups score you big points on the "nice" list, .Plus, I know how much you adore sit-ups, so Yeah, that explains it!

Got any big post-Toy-Day workout plans? I'm starting on my New Year's resolutions a little early.That's right! Twelve straight months of leg days. By this time next year, I wanna be able to jump to the moon!

Do you think Santa ever visits places AFTER Toy Day? I really wanted to meet him last night, but I dozed off.I wanna ask him what his marathon time is. If he's delivering that many presents that fast, it's gotta be good.
